taxa.comment: According to the source, "Crematogastrini are all the genera under consideration in this paper, namely, Aretidris (= Myrmicine Genus #26 PH02 sensu WARD & al. (2015))".  This establishes the relationship of synonymy with "Myrmicine genus26 PH02" in ot_1247 by Ward, et al. 2015.
taxa.name: Aretidris buenaventei
taxa.name_derivation: Taxon subsequently published under this name

sources.source: General, D.E.M., 2015.  Aretidris, a new genus of ants (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Myrmicinae) from the mountains of Luzon Island, Philippines.  Myrmecol. News 21: 131-136.  Available from https://myrmecologicalnews.org/cms/index.php?view=category&id=622%253Amyrmecol-news-21-131-136&option=com_content&Itemid=91
